name: Curse of the Void
description:
WARNING: This game contains themes like depression which may be triggering for some individuals, you play at your own risk.

This game can best be described as an audio-only, narrated, interactive experience.

It was made in 2 days for the Audiogame Jam as a way to explore positional audio. All audio was made during the game's creation. These are the diversifiers I reached for the jam: Audio only, spatialisation and jam made audio.

Thanks to Jerkakame for providing his voice in the ending!
